name: Throw Dungeon
description:
Made for the benbonk game jam in about 50h-ish by dabt0402 using unreal engine 4, all visuals and programming created by dabt

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse button to pick up and interact
  • Get keys and escape the dungeon!
Assets used: 
  • https://freesound.org random sounds gathered from here
  • https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl most of the music 
  •  https://alanzaringmusic.itch.io/rpg-music-starter-pack boss music
